steps.name: Given I navigate to the PerfectDraft website
Given I am on the UK website
When I navigate to the "PerfectDraft Machines" section
Then I should see all machine types:
Then I should see a feature comparison link
steps.statusMessage: Expected comparisonLinkVisible to be true because Feature comparison link should be visible on the machines page, but found False.

steps.name: When I click on a machine to view details
Then I should see machine specifications including keg size
